entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Banff
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Banff 09:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -27.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -33.2°C
Wind: SW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
